Hero.title: Stop blank screens on CSR revisits.
Hero.subtitle: A three-layer toolkit that restores the last screen instantly.
Hero.bodyLine1: FirstTx combines Prepaint, Local-First, and Tx into one toolkit.
Hero.bodyLine2: Keep your CSR architecture while adding instant revisit recovery, offline resilience, and safe optimistic UI.

DemoCard.beforeUserRevisitDetail: User clicks back or re-enters the CSR app.
DemoCard.beforeBlankDetail: 1-2 seconds of white screen or spinner while JS and data load.
DemoCard.beforeMountDetail: React mounts only after bundles and API calls finish.
DemoCard.afterBootDetail: A tiny boot script runs right after the HTML is loaded.
DemoCard.afterRestoreDetail: Restores the last DOM snapshot from IndexedDB instantly on revisit.
DemoCard.afterHydrationDetail: React hydrates and data sync runs in the background while the user continues.
DemoCard.viewTransitions: With the View Transition API, restores can become smooth crossfades instead of hard cuts.

HeaderRow.title: Prepaint · Local-First · Tx
HeaderRow.description: Pick the layers you need. Use Prepaint for revisit speed, and add Local-First and Tx for sync and optimistic UI.

prepaint.name: Prepaint
prepaint.description: Capture the last screen as a DOM snapshot and restore it before React loads.
points: Restore on revisit before any JS runs
Make CSR revisits feel close to SSR

localFirst.name: Local-First
localFirst.description: Use IndexedDB as the source of truth and automate server sync.
points: TTL and staleness metadata built in

tx.name: Tx
tx.description: Wrap optimistic UI updates in transactions you can safely roll back.
points: Run multi-step updates as a single transaction
Keep UI state consistent on network errors

Experience.title: FirstTx from a user’s perspective
Experience.description: SSR helps first visits, but users spend more time revisiting, tabbing, and going back. FirstTx focuses on those moments so returning feels already-ready.

cards.title: Internal tools with frequent revisits
cards.description: Show the previous state immediately in CRM/admin/dashboard flows that bounce list → detail → list.

cards.title: Refreshing mid-task
cards.description: Local models keep the latest snapshot, so accidental refreshes preserve your working context.

cards.title: Handling failed optimistic UI
cards.description: Rollback happens per transaction, avoiding half-reverted screens when servers fail.

cards.title: Offline resilience
cards.description: A simple sync hook results in a data layer that tolerates offline/online transitions.

QuickStart.title: Start FirstTx with three lines
QuickStart.description: Most cases install all three packages. You can pick only Prepaint / Local-First / Tx as needed.
